languages.text: "Слышу слова истинн{mf|ого|ой} наследни{mf|ка|цы} Леди Теодоры. И обещание скорой расправы над еретиками"
"I hear the words of the true heir of Lady Theodora. And the promise of swift retribution against heretics."
languages.original_text: "Слышу слова истинн{mf|ого|ой} наследни{mf|ка|цы} Леди Теодоры. И обещание скорой расправы над еретиками"

traits.locale_text: "I hear the words of the true heir of Lady Theodora. And the promise of swift retribution against heretics."
"I hear the words of the true heir of Lady Theodora. And the promise of swift retribution against heretics."
"I hear the words of the true heir of Lady Theodora. And the promise of swift retribution against heretics."
"I hear the words of the true heir of Lady Theodora. And the promise of swift retribution against heretics."
"I hear the words of the true heir of Lady Theodora. And the promise of swift retribution against heretics."

languages.text: «Escucho en usted la voz de{mf|l| la} verdader{mf|o|a} hereder{mf|o|a} de lady Theodora y la promesa de una justicia rápida contra los herejes».
languages.original_text: "I hear the words of the true heir of Lady Theodora. And the promise of swift retribution against heretics."

traits.locale_text: «Escucho en usted la voz de{mf|l| la} verdader{mf|o|a} hereder{mf|o|a} de lady Theodora y la promesa de una justicia rápida contra los herejes».

languages.text: “我听说过关于你的传言。你是西奥多拉夫人真正的继承人，对异端分子不留一丝情面。”
languages.original_text: "I hear the words of the true heir of Lady Theodora. And the promise of swift retribution against heretics."

traits.locale_text: “我听说过关于你的传言。你是西奥多拉夫人真正的继承人，对异端分子不留一丝情面。”

languages.text: « Voilà qui est parler en digne {mf|héritier|héritière} de dame Théodora. J'y vois la promesse d'un châtiment expéditif à l'encontre des hérétiques. »
languages.original_text: "I hear the words of the true heir of Lady Theodora. And the promise of swift retribution against heretics."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà qui est parler en digne {mf|héritier|héritière} de dame Théodora. J'y vois la promesse d'un châtiment expéditif à l'encontre des hérétiques. »

languages.text: 「私は、レディ・シオドーラの真の後継者の言葉を聞いている。そして異端者に対する迅速な報復の約束も」
languages.original_text: "I hear the words of the true heir of Lady Theodora. And the promise of swift retribution against heretics."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、レディ・シオドーラの真の後継者の言葉を聞いている。そして異端者に対する迅速な報復の約束も」

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora'nın gerçek vârisinin sözlerini işitiyorum. Aynı zamanda kâfirlere karşı hızlı bir öç vaadini."
languages.original_text: "I hear the words of the true heir of Lady Theodora. And the promise of swift retribution against heretics."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Theodora'nın gerçek vârisinin sözlerini işitiyorum. Aynı zamanda kâfirlere karşı hızlı bir öç vaadini."

languages.text: "Ich höre die Worte {mf|des wahren Erben|der wahren Erbin} von Lady Theodora. Und das Versprechen einer schnellen Vergeltung gegen Ketzer."
languages.original_text: "I hear the words of the true heir of Lady Theodora. And the promise of swift retribution against heretics."

traits.locale_text: "Ich höre die Worte {mf|des wahren Erben|der wahren Erbin} von Lady Theodora. Und das Versprechen einer schnellen Vergeltung gegen Ketzer."
